title: Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the localization key is left blank when adding, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When trying to add a new entry with a blank key in the properties file, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: When adding a new entry with a blank key in the properties file, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Add a new entry with a blank key.
3. Verify that the externalized text is still displayed in the chart title.
